Coverage.Packaging: Auto coverage written as an endorsement to a CMP, CPP or BOP policy.
Coverage.PoolAffiliation: Standard risk written in a pool, JUA or assigned risk facility, etc.
Coverage.UMUIMStacking: UM and/or UIM limits stacked (per vehicle)
Coverage.PassiveRestraintDiscount: Air Bags for both front seat occupants.
Coverage.AntiLockBrakesDiscount: Program offers an Anti-Lock Braking System discount on this coverage, but the vehicle does not qualify for the discount.
Coverage.AntiTheftDeviceDiscount: Vehicles with alarm only — with discount
Coverage.DefensiveDriverDiscount: Driver does not qualify for the defensive driver discount available on this coverage.

Vehicle.BodyStyle: Truck (Not including Truck Tractors or Dump Trucks)
